name: Thunder Manifestation
desc:
An abnormal Electro elemental life form. Although it might appear similar to an Oceanid, it does not possess her intelligence or memories.
That which drives the Thunder Manifestation is a much more primal fury.
It is said that these life forms will only descend like lightning upon places that play host to great lingering resentment, such as the fragmented Amakumo Peak, where the storm clouds ever roil. As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

value.name: Thunder Manifestation
value.desc:
"Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation

As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

customize.text: An elemental life form created as the avatar of thunderous indignation. It uses lightning attacks and its Strike Probes to <color=#ffe14b>lock on to its foes</color> . If a locked-on target is present, the Thunder Manifestation will enter an enraged state and prioritize the annihilation of that target.

<color=#ffd780>Love and Non-Communication</color>
Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without ever being locked onto.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Thunder Fall</color>
Defeat a Thunder Manifestation while it is in flight.

customize.name: Primogem

Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without being hit by its homing thunder cage attack.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Storm Beads
dropMaterial.desc:
Crackling Electro pearls left behind by the Thunder Manifestation.
It is said that Thunder Manifestations will only descend upon lands where powerful hatred dwells. The singers say that it is the unbearable disappointments and sufferings of life that drive them to forever wander the broken earth, unleashing sky-searing lightning as they go.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"
